attributes.action: PUBLISH THE ADDRESSES AND AMOUNTS OF ALL BENEFIT CLAIMANTS
attributes.additional_details:
The government asks us to report those who are falsely claiming benefits. It's not easy to know in most cases. Some welfare claimants are not your typical suspects.

Cut the chase, serve notice that in 2 years time, all addresses and the amounts sent to those addresses will be available on a national database.

If you are a genuine receiver, you should not be scared or worried. Empty flats and bogus addresses that claim should be very worried.

Why didn't we think about this long long ago?
